FILE LAYOUT – HISTORICAL QUOTATIONS 
CHAPTER I – HISTORICAL QUOTATIONS FILE LAYOUT  – 
COTAHIST.AAAA.TXT 
 
Página: 2/9 
PUBLIC INFORMATION 
Data: 17/04/2017 
Review: 01 
1 BASIC CONCEPTS 
The COTAHIST.AAAA.TXT file contains the historical quotation data relative 
to the negotiation of all financial market papers during a one-year period, 
classified by the fields: Type of Register, Date of Exchange, BDI (Daily 
Information Bulletin) Code, Company Name and Negotiation Code. This sub-
division can be modified according to the  user’s preferences / requirements, 
according to the equipment and software available. 
The name of the file identifies the corresponding year. Ex.: 
COTAHIST.1990.TXT, COTAHIST.1991.TXT, Etc. 
2 FILE STRUCTURE 
File Name: COTAHIST.AAAA.TXT 
Types of Registers: Each file is composed of three types of registers. 
 Register - 00 - Header 
 Register - 01 – Daily paper quotations 
 Register - 99 - Trailer Register Size: 245 bytes.
